trees.name: Master Notes
trees.organizingPrinciple: Universal Knowledge Base. Organized by Domain (Tech/Personal), Project, and Status.

seedFolders.title: Active Projects
seedFolders.gist: Current work in progress. Projects actively being developed or maintained.

seedFolders.title: Reference
seedFolders.gist: Stable reference material. Documentation, guides, and specifications for ongoing use.

children.title: Technical
children.gist: Programming, systems, tools, and technical documentation

children.title: Personal
children.gist: Life systems, habits, and personal knowledge

seedFolders.title: Archives
seedFolders.gist: Completed or deprecated material. Preserved for historical reference.

seedFolders.title: Journal
seedFolders.gist: Chronological entries. Daily notes, reflections, and observations.

trees.name: Infinite Context Log
trees.organizingPrinciple: Episodic Narrative. Organized Hierarchically by: 1. Epoch/Year, 2. Session/Project Thread, 3. Interaction Phase (e.g., 'Problem Statement', 'Exploration', 'Resolution').

forbiddenConcepts: omitting code blocks or specific configuration values
merging distinct dissenting arguments into a single consensus
losing the chronological order of events
requiredContext: Unique identifiers (File names, Error codes, Variable names)

trees.name: Enterprise Governance & Standards
trees.organizingPrinciple: The Compliance Pyramid. Organized first by Functional Domain (e.g., Engineering, InfoSec, Operations), then by Authority Level: 1. Policies (Mandates), 2. Procedures (SOPs/Workflows), 3. Standards (Coding Rules, Tooling), 4. Records/Reference.

seedFolders.title: Engineering
seedFolders.gist: Software development standards, architecture decisions, and technical governance.

children.title: Policies
children.gist: Mandates and rules for engineering practices. MUST-level requirements.

children.title: Procedures
children.gist: SOPs, workflows, and how-to guides for engineering processes.

children.title: Standards
children.gist: Technical constraints, coding rules, and tooling specifications.

children.title: Code Style
children.gist: Coding conventions, formatting rules, and naming standards.

children.title: Architecture
children.gist: System design patterns, ADRs, and structural guidelines.

children.title: Testing
children.gist: Test coverage requirements, QA processes, and validation rules.

children.title: DevOps
children.gist: CI/CD standards, deployment procedures, and infrastructure rules.

children.title: Reference
children.gist: Tool documentation, role definitions, and technical glossaries.

seedFolders.title: InfoSec
seedFolders.gist: Information security policies, compliance requirements, and security standards.

children.title: Policies
children.gist: Security mandates, access control rules, and data protection requirements.

children.title: Procedures
children.gist: Incident response workflows, audit processes, and security reviews.

children.title: Standards
children.gist: Security controls, encryption requirements, and compliance frameworks.

children.title: Access Control
children.gist: Authentication, authorization, and identity management standards.

children.title: Data Protection
children.gist: Encryption, data handling, and privacy requirements.

children.title: Network Security
children.gist: Firewall rules, network segmentation, and traffic policies.

children.title: Reference
children.gist: Compliance mappings, security tools, and threat models.

seedFolders.title: Operations
seedFolders.gist: Operational procedures, SLAs, and infrastructure governance.

children.title: Policies
children.gist: Operational mandates, availability requirements, and service level rules.

children.title: Procedures
children.gist: Runbooks, escalation workflows, and maintenance processes.

children.title: Standards
children.gist: Monitoring requirements, alerting thresholds, and capacity rules.

children.title: Reference
children.gist: Service catalogs, on-call rotations, and vendor contacts.

seedFolders.title: HR & People
seedFolders.gist: Human resources policies, onboarding procedures, and organizational standards.

children.title: Policies
children.gist: Employment policies, conduct rules, and compliance requirements.

children.title: Procedures
children.gist: Hiring workflows, performance reviews, and offboarding processes.

children.title: Reference
children.gist: Role definitions, org charts, and benefits documentation.
